alt: An open empty command palette in a browser's developer tools. Suggestions for the search box include 'Show Application', 'Show CSS Overview', and 'Show Console', among other things.
The DevTools command palette showing the text 'disable javascript' in the search box, and the top suggestion being 'Disable JavaScript' with the 'Debugger' tag next to it.
The DevTools command palette showing the text 'enable javascript' in the search box, and the top suggestion being 'Enable JavaScript' with the 'Debugger'
The DevTools settings menu showing settings for Appearance, Sources, Elements, Network, Performance, Console, Extension, Persistence, Debugger, Global, and Sync
